title: Blended Language Learning Service Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Designing blended learning services for language proficiency improvement in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can complete language practice assignments at least twice weekly using mobile platforms
Learners can produce language projects incorporating peer assessment feedback during offline workshops
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans in a blended learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
